001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
004
005import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
006
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.CaseChanging;
008
009/**
010 * Formats a LogEvent message.
011 *
012 * @apiNote This is sealed at the moment and maybe unsealed in the future so exhaustive
013 * pattern matching should not be done.
014 */
015@CaseChanging
016public sealed interface LogMessageFormatter {
017
018        /**
019         * Formats and appends the results.
020         * @param builder output.
021         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
022         * @param arg1 to use for replacement.
023         */
024        void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1);
025
026        /**
027         * Formats and appends the results.
028         * @param builder output.
029         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
030         * @param arg1 to use for replacement.
031         * @param arg2 to use for replacement.
032         */
033        void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2);
034
035        /**
036         * Formats and appends the result.
037         * @param builder output.
038         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
039         * @param args array of args.
040         */
041        void formatArray(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object[] args);
042
043        /**
044         * Built-in message formatters.
045         */
046        @CaseChanging
047        public enum StandardMessageFormatter implements LogMessageFormatter {
048
049                /**
050                 * SLF4J format style where "<code>{}</code>" is replaced with the parameters. The
051                 * implementation largely comes from the SLF4J but optimized for StringBuilder.
052                 */
053                SLF4J() {
054                        @Override
055                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1) {
056                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, arg1);
057                        }
058
059                        @Override
060                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2) {
061                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, arg1, arg2);
062                        }
063
064                        @Override
065                        public void formatArray(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object[] args) {
066                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, args);
067                        }
068                }
069
070        }
071
072}
073
074final class SLF4JMessageFormatter {
075
076        private static final char DELIM_START = '{';
077
078        // private static final char DELIM_STOP = '}';
079        private static final String DELIM_STR = "{}";
080
081        private static final char ESCAPE_CHAR = '\\';
082
083        private SLF4JMessageFormatter() {
084        }
085
086        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
087                        final @Nullable Object arg1) {
088                format(sbuf, messagePattern, arg1, null, null, 1);
089        }
090
091        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
092                        final @Nullable Object arg1, final @Nullable Object arg2) {
093                format(sbuf, messagePattern, arg1, arg2, null, 2);
094        }
095
096        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
097                        final @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args) {
098                if (args == null || args.length == 0) {
099                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, null, null, null, 0);
100                        return;
101                }
102                else if (args.length == 1) {
103                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, args[0], null, null, 1);
104                        return;
105                }
106                else if (args.length == 2) {
107                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, args[0], args[1], null, 2);
108                        return;
109                }
110                else {
111                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, null, null, args, args.length);
112                }
113        }
114
115        private static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, //
116                        final @Nullable String messagePattern, //
117                        final @Nullable Object arg1, //
118                        final @Nullable Object arg2, //
119                        final @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args, //
120                        final int argCount) {
121
122                if (messagePattern == null) {
123                        return;
124                }
125
126                if (argCount == 0) {
127                        sbuf.append(messagePattern);
128                        return;
129                }
130
131                int i = 0;
132                int j;
133                int L;
134                for (L = 0; L < argCount; L++) {
135
136                        j = messagePattern.indexOf(DELIM_STR, i);
137
138                        if (j == -1) {
139                                // no more variables
140                                if (i == 0) { // this is a simple string
141                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern);
142                                        return;
143                                }
144                                else { // add the tail string which contains no variables and return
145                                                // the result.
146                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, messagePattern.length());
147                                        return;
148                                }
149                        }
150                        else {
151                                if (isEscapedDelimeter(messagePattern, j)) {
152                                        if (!isDoubleEscaped(messagePattern, j)) {
153                                                L--; // DELIM_START was escaped, thus should not be incremented
154                                                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j - 1);
155                                                sbuf.append(DELIM_START);
156                                                i = j + 1;
157                                        }
158                                        else {
159                                                // The escape character preceding the delimiter start is
160                                                // itself escaped: "abc x:\\{}"
161                                                // we have to consume one backward slash
162                                                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j - 1);
163                                                Object arg = resolveArg(L, arg1, arg2, args, argCount);
164                                                deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, arg, null);
165                                                i = j + 2;
166                                        }
167                                }
168                                else {
169                                        // normal case
170                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j);
171                                        Object arg = resolveArg(L, arg1, arg2, args, argCount);
172                                        deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, arg, null);
173                                        i = j + 2;
174                                }
175                        }
176                }
177                // append the characters following the last {} pair.
178                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, messagePattern.length());
179        }
180
181        private static @Nullable Object resolveArg(int i, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2,
182                        @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args, int argCount) {
183                if (i >= argCount || argCount == 0) {
184                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
185                }
186                if (argCount > 2) {
187                        if (args == null) {
188                                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
189                        }
190                        return args[i];
191                }
192                else if (i == 0) {
193                        return arg1;
194                }
195                else if (i == 1) {
196                        return arg2;
197                }
198                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
199        }
200
201        final static boolean isEscapedDelimeter(String messagePattern, int delimeterStartIndex) {
202
203                if (delimeterStartIndex == 0) {
204                        return false;
205                }
206                char potentialEscape = messagePattern.charAt(delimeterStartIndex - 1);
207                if (potentialEscape == ESCAPE_CHAR) {
208                        return true;
209                }
210                else {
211                        return false;
212                }
213        }
214
215        final static boolean isDoubleEscaped(String messagePattern, int delimeterStartIndex) {
216                if (delimeterStartIndex >= 2 && messagePattern.charAt(delimeterStartIndex - 2) == ESCAPE_CHAR) {
217                        return true;
218                }
219                else {
220                        return false;
221                }
222        }
223
224        /*
225         * The below is adapted code from SLF4J
226         */
227        // special treatment of array values was suggested by 'lizongbo'
228        private static void deeplyAppendParameter(StringBuilder sbuf, @Nullable Object o,
229                        @Nullable IdentityHashMap<@Nullable Object[], @Nullable Object> seenMap) {
230                if (o == null) {
231                        sbuf.append("null");
232                        return;
233                }
234                if (!o.getClass().isArray()) {
235                        safeObjectAppend(sbuf, o);
236                }
237                else {
238                        // check for primitive array types because they
239                        // unfortunately cannot be cast to Object[]
240                        if (o instanceof boolean[]) {
241                                booleanArrayAppend(sbuf, (boolean[]) o);
242                        }
243                        else if (o instanceof byte[]) {
244                                byteArrayAppend(sbuf, (byte[]) o);
245                        }
246                        else if (o instanceof char[]) {
247                                charArrayAppend(sbuf, (char[]) o);
248                        }
249                        else if (o instanceof short[]) {
250                                shortArrayAppend(sbuf, (short[]) o);
251                        }
252                        else if (o instanceof int[]) {
253                                intArrayAppend(sbuf, (int[]) o);
254                        }
255                        else if (o instanceof long[]) {
256                                longArrayAppend(sbuf, (long[]) o);
257                        }
258                        else if (o instanceof float[]) {
259                                floatArrayAppend(sbuf, (float[]) o);
260                        }
261                        else if (o instanceof double[]) {
262                                doubleArrayAppend(sbuf, (double[]) o);
263                        }
264                        else {
265                                if (seenMap == null) {
266                                        seenMap = new IdentityHashMap<>();
267                                }
268                                objectArrayAppend(sbuf, (@Nullable Object[]) o, seenMap);
269                        }
270                }
271        }
272
273        private static void safeObjectAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, Object o) {
274                try {
275                        String oAsString = o.toString();
276                        sbuf.append(oAsString);
277                }
278                catch (Throwable t) {
279                        // Util.report("SLF4J: Failed toString() invocation on an object of type [" +
280                        // o.getClass().getName() + "]", t);
281                        sbuf.append("[FAILED toString()]");
282                }
283
284        }
285
286        private static void objectArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, @Nullable Object[] a,
287                        IdentityHashMap<@Nullable Object[], @Nullable Object> seenMap) {
288                sbuf.append('[');
289                if (!seenMap.containsKey(a)) {
290                        seenMap.put(a, null);
291                        final int len = a.length;
292                        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
293                                deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, a[i], seenMap);
294                                if (i != len - 1)
295                                        sbuf.append(", ");
296                        }
297                        // allow repeats in siblings
298                        seenMap.remove(a);
299                }
300                else {
301                        sbuf.append("...");
302                }
303                sbuf.append(']');
304        }
305
306        private static void booleanArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, boolean[] a) {
307                sbuf.append('[');
308                final int len = a.length;
309                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
310                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
311                        if (i != len - 1)
312                                sbuf.append(", ");
313                }
314                sbuf.append(']');
315        }
316
317        private static void byteArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, byte[] a) {
318                sbuf.append('[');
319                final int len = a.length;
320                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
321                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
322                        if (i != len - 1)
323                                sbuf.append(", ");
324                }
325                sbuf.append(']');
326        }
327
328        private static void charArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, char[] a) {
329                sbuf.append('[');
330                final int len = a.length;
331                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
332                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
333                        if (i != len - 1)
334                                sbuf.append(", ");
335                }
336                sbuf.append(']');
337        }
338
339        private static void shortArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, short[] a) {
340                sbuf.append('[');
341                final int len = a.length;
342                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
343                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
344                        if (i != len - 1)
345                                sbuf.append(", ");
346                }
347                sbuf.append(']');
348        }
349
350        private static void intArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, int[] a) {
351                sbuf.append('[');
352                final int len = a.length;
353                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
354                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
355                        if (i != len - 1)
356                                sbuf.append(", ");
357                }
358                sbuf.append(']');
359        }
360
361        private static void longArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, long[] a) {
362                sbuf.append('[');
363                final int len = a.length;
364                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
365                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
366                        if (i != len - 1)
367                                sbuf.append(", ");
368                }
369                sbuf.append(']');
370        }
371
372        private static void floatArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, float[] a) {
373                sbuf.append('[');
374                final int len = a.length;
375                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
376                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
377                        if (i != len - 1)
378                                sbuf.append(", ");
379                }
380                sbuf.append(']');
381        }
382
383        private static void doubleArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, double[] a) {
384                sbuf.append('[');
385                final int len = a.length;
386                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
387                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
388                        if (i != len - 1)
389                                sbuf.append(", ");
390                }
391                sbuf.append(']');
392        }
393
394}
